parameters.query:
-- Weekly Summary Stats
WITH week_data AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) as active_players_this_week,
    COUNT(*) as scores_set_this_week,
    COUNT(DISTINCT machine_id) as machines_played_this_week,
    COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(date_set)) as days_with_activity
  FROM High_Scores_Archive
  WHERE date_set >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
),
last_week_data AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) as active_players_last_week,
    COUNT(*) as scores_set_last_week
  FROM High_Scores_Archive
  WHERE date_set >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days'
    AND date_set < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
),
total_data AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) as total_players_ever,
    COUNT(*) as total_scores_ever,
    MIN(date_set) as first_score_date
  FROM High_Scores_Archive
),
new_players AS (
  SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) as new_players_this_week
  FROM Players
  WHERE last_seen >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
    AND player_id NOT IN (
      SELECT DISTINCT player_id 
      FROM High_Scores_Archive 
      WHERE date_set < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
    )
),
event_info AS (
  SELECT event_name, start_date, stop_date
  FROM Events
  WHERE is_active = true
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT 
  w.*,
  lw.active_players_last_week,
  lw.scores_set_last_week,
  t.total_players_ever,
  t.total_scores_ever,
  t.first_score_date,
  np.new_players_this_week,
  e.event_name,
  e.start_date as event_start,
  e.stop_date as event_end,
  CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' as report_start_date,
  CURRENT_DATE as report_end_date,
  -- Calculate growth percentages
  CASE 
    WHEN lw.active_players_last_week > 0 
    THEN ROUND(((w.active_players_this_week - lw.active_players_last_week)::numeric / lw.active_players_last_week * 100), 1)
    ELSE 0 
  END as player_growth_pct,
  CASE 
    WHEN lw.scores_set_last_week > 0 
    THEN ROUND(((w.scores_set_this_week - lw.scores_set_last_week)::numeric / lw.scores_set_last_week * 100), 1)
    ELSE 0 
  END as activity_growth_pct
FROM week_data w
CROSS JOIN last_week_data lw
CROSS JOIN total_data t
CROSS JOIN new_players np
CROSS JOIN event_info e;

-- Top 10 Most Active Players This Week
SELECT 
  p.display_name,
  COUNT(*) as scores_set,
  COUNT(DISTINCT h.machine_id) as machines_played,
  MAX(h.high_score) as highest_score_this_week,
  l.current_rank as current_leaderboard_rank
FROM High_Scores_Archive h
JOIN Players p ON h.player_id = p.player_id
LEFT JOIN Leaderboard_Cache l ON h.player_id = l.player_id
WHERE h.date_set >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
GROUP BY p.display_name, l.current_rank
ORDER BY scores_set DESC, machines_played DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Most Popular Machines This Week
SELECT 
  m.machine_name,
  COUNT(*) as plays_this_week,
  COUNT(DISTINCT h.player_id) as unique_players,
  MAX(h.high_score) as highest_score
FROM High_Scores_Archive h
JOIN Machines m ON h.machine_id = m.machine_id
WHERE h.date_set >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
GROUP BY m.machine_name
ORDER BY plays_this_week DESC
LIMIT 5;

-- Current Top 10 Leaderboard
SELECT 
  p.display_name,
  l.combined_score,
  l.current_rank,
  -- Check if they played this week
  CASE 
    WHEN EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM High_Scores_Archive h2 
      WHERE h2.player_id = p.player_id 
      AND h2.date_set >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
    ) THEN true
    ELSE false
  END as active_this_week
FROM Leaderboard_Cache l
JOIN Players p ON l.player_id = p.player_id
ORDER BY l.current_rank ASC
LIMIT 10;

-- Biggest Movers (Rank Changes)
WITH current_ranks AS (
  SELECT player_id, current_rank, combined_score
  FROM Leaderboard_Cache
),
last_week_ranks AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (player_id)
    player_id, current_rank as rank_last_week
  FROM Leaderboard_History
  WHERE recorded_at <= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
  ORDER BY player_id, recorded_at DESC
)
SELECT 
  p.display_name,
  c.current_rank,
  COALESCE(lw.rank_last_week, 999) as rank_last_week,
  COALESCE(lw.rank_last_week, 999) - c.current_rank as positions_gained,
  c.combined_score
FROM current_ranks c
JOIN Players p ON c.player_id = p.player_id
LEFT JOIN last_week_ranks lw ON c.player_id = lw.player_id
WHERE (COALESCE(lw.rank_last_week, 999) - c.current_rank) > 0
ORDER BY positions_gained DESC
LIMIT 5;
